column4: can anybody help me with with a wifi device that i want to install in Ubuntu? plz
you see, i am very new to Ubuntu
i don't know where to get it
do i need to download it or is it in the package already?
it's in the CD too
ok, i already installed Ubuntu on my laptop. how do i find ndiswrapper
do you have the CD?
yes, i do
ok ehm, I think how I did it was
I put the CD in and this message showed up asking if I wanted it to load packages or something
click Yes, and it should load Synaptic Package Manager automatically
and I think I typed ndiswrapper in the search bar and selected all the ndiswrapper components for d/l
i already have SPM installed, should i try to install the ndis... package from there?
sry, I d/l'd ubuntu like only today so I don't know what SPM is >.<""
sorry, SPM stands fro Synaptic Package Manager
np, when I put in the CD, and clicked 'yes' (or something to that effect when a message popped up) SPM loaded automatically
and I found ndiswrapper through SPM, but I think you need to insert the CD just so SPM can find the ndiswrapper package?
can i let the SPM find and install the ndis... thru the internet
I'm sure you can do that too
actually ndiswrapper has its own site, just google ndiswrapper and you should find it
but learning how to use ndiswrapper is where I'm stuck right now >.<""
